rooms.description: North-facing entrance area with decorative elements, following Vastu guidelines for prosperity and welcome. This space transitions from the exterior to interior living areas.

Open and airy living area designed with Bohemian aesthetics including eclectic decor, vibrant colors, and comfortable seating arrangements. Natural light is maximized through north-facing windows and large openings.
An integrated dining space adjacent to the living room. Features a mix of modern and vintage furniture with an emphasis on communal gathering and cultural vibrancy.
Fully equipped kitchen designed for convenience and functionality, incorporating Bohemian style elements such as rustic tiles and natural finishes while adhering to local safety regulations.

openings.description: A grand entry door aligned with Vastu principles promoting positive energy flow.
Multiple windows ensuring ample natural light and ventilation, crucial for both aesthetic appeal and adherence to local building norms.
